name: nvim-jupy-bridge
displayName: Neovim - VS Code Notebook Sync Runner
description: Auto-jump & execute target cell in vscode notebook, while editing in Neovim (using Jupytext)

commands.title: NvimJupy: Run From Last Edited Cell (Current + Below)

nvimJupy.delayMs.description: Notebook 更新イベントを固定待機時間。動作が不安定な場合は増やす

nvimJupy.openIfClosed.description: 対応する .ipynb が閉じていたら自動で開く
